blog.title: x402 Implementation Plan für ImageGen
blog.description: Detaillierter Implementierungsplan zur Integration des x402 Payment-Protokolls in den AI Image Generation Service mit Beibehaltung der NFT-Funktionalität. Der NFT-Mint dient als Payment-Proof.

prevBlog.title: How bots exploited my ImageGen contract - and how I fixed it
prevBlog.description: A bot network exploited a vulnerability in my GenImNFT contract, extracting over 80 cents. Here's how they did it, how I fixed it, and what the forensic analysis revealed about the bot network that seemingly extracts substantial sums.

nftMetadata.prompt: "A high-quality, cinematic illustration showing a swarm of autonomous blockchain bots attacking a...
nftMetadata.name: AI Generated Art #161
nftMetadata.description: AI generated artwork based on the prompt: "A high-quality, cinematic illustration showing a swarm of autonomous blockchain bots attacking a vulnerable smart contract. Visualize stylized digital “bot” entities (glowing geometric shapes or small drone-like agents) racing through a mempool-like network grid toward a smart-contract block labeled “GenImNFT”. One bot steals a tiny coin reward (symbolizing 80 cents), while alarms or red warning indicators flash around the contract. The scene should look technical, cyber-forensic, and slightly humorous due to the small value stolen. Use a dark, neon, cyberpunk color palette of blues, teals, and pinks. Include subtle blockchain motifs (Ethereum logo fragments, gas-fee graphs, bridging arrows). No text overlays."
